feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
